```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
libs <- c("htmltools", "webutils", "typed")
lapply(libs, library, character.only = TRUE)
df <- data.frame(x = 1:10, uvcharts = runif(10, 0, 5), chartist = runif(10, 0, 5))

library(dplyr)

library(uvcharts)
uvplot <- df %>%
  uv_stackbar(x) %>%
  uv_add(uvcharts) %>%
  uv_add(chartist) %>%
  uv_graph(orientation = "Horizontal", bgcolor = "none") %>%
  uv_axis(ticks = 10, fontsize = 9, strokecolor = "#d3d3d3") %>%
  uv_label(fontsize = 5) %>%
  uv_config(legend = list(showlegends = TRUE)) %>%
  uv_margin(20, 20, 30, 70) %>%
  uv_legend(position = "right") %>% 
  uv_frame(bgcolor = "none") %>% 
  uv_dimension(height = 300)

library(chartist)

chartistplot <- mtcars %>%
  mutate(id = 1:n()) %>%
  chart_ist(id, height = 450) %>%
  add_ist(mpg, name = "mpg") %>%
  add_ist(wt, name = "wt") %>%
  add_ist(qsec, name = "qsec") %>%
  lineopt_ist(name = "qsec", lineSmoothing = "step", showPoint = FALSE) %>%
  lineopt_ist(name = "wt", showLine = TRUE, showPoint = TRUE, lineSmoothing = 3) %>%
  lineopt_ist(name = "mpg", showArea = TRUE, showPoint = FALSE) %>%
  xaxis_ist(showGrid = FALSE, showLabel = FALSE) %>%
  yaxis_ist(showGrid = FALSE, showLabel = FALSE) %>%
  lanim_ist() %>%
  sanim_ist() %>%
  loop_ist(6000)

library(echarts)

df <- data.frame()
for(i in seq(1:20)){
  date <- Sys.time() + i * 3600
  value <- round(runif(1, 5, 20))
  df <- rbind.data.frame(df, cbind.data.frame(date, value))
}

echart <- df %>% 
  echart(date, width = "100%") %>% 
  eline(value, symbolSize = htmlwidgets::JS("function(value){ return value/2}"), showAllSymbol = TRUE) %>% 
  etheme("macarons") 
```

```{r, projects row 1}
tube <- div(class = "thumbnail js-tilt rellax",
          a(href = "packages/youTubeDataR/",
            img(src = "img/thumbnails/youTubeDataR.png", class = "img-responsive")),
            div(class = "caption",
                h3("youTubeDataR"),
                p("youTubeDataR is an R package that provides access to the YouTube Data API"),
                h4(span("api", class = "label label-info"))))
chartist <- div(class = "thumbnail js-tilt rellax",
          a(href = "htmlwidgets/chartist/",
            img(src = "img/thumbnails/chartist.png", class = "img-responsive")),
            div(class = "caption",
                h3("chartist"),
                p("chartist is an R htmlwidget for chartist.js in R."),
                h4(span("visualisation", class = "label label-success"))))

wine <- div(class = "thumbnail js-tilt rellax",
          a(href = "http://johncoene.github.io/wine", target = "_blank",
            img(src = "img/thumbnails/wine-dashboard.jpg", class = "img-responsive")),
            div(class = "caption",
                h3("Wine on Twitter"),
                p("Wine dashboard is a set of dahsboards about conversations on wine occuring on Twitter."),
                h4(span("dashboard", class = "label label-warning"))))

# title
tube <- tagAppendAttributes(tube, "data-tilt" = NA)
chartist <- tagAppendAttributes(chartist, "data-tilt" = NA)
wine <- tagAppendAttributes(wine, "data-tilt" = NA)

# rellax 
tube <- tagAppendAttributes(tube, "data-aos" = "zoom-in-right", "data-aos-duration"="1000")
chartist <- tagAppendAttributes(chartist, "data-aos" = "zoom-in-up","data-aos-duration"="1000")
wine <- tagAppendAttributes(wine, "data-aos" = "zoom-in-left","data-aos-duration"="1000")

div(class = "row",
    div(class = "col-lg-4 col-md-4", tube),
    div(class = "col-lg-4 col-md-4", chartist),
    div(class = "col-lg-4 col-md-4", wine))
```

```{r echarts jumbo, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
df <- data.frame(x = 1:150,
                 y = round(rnorm(150, mean = 5, sd = 1), 2),
                 z = round(rnorm(150, mean = 7, sd = 1), 2))

pointer <- list(
  show = TRUE,
  type = "cross",
  lineStyle = list(
    type = "dashed",
    width = 0.8
  )
)

jumb <- df %>% 
  echart(x, height = 300) %>% 
  escatter(y, name = "Clicks") %>% 
  escatter(z, name = "Views") %>% 
  emark_point(which = "all", data = list(list(type = "min"), list(type = "max"))) %>% 
  emark_line(which = "all", data = list(list(type = "average"))) %>% 
  etooltip(axisPointer = pointer, showDelay = 0) %>% 
  eoptions(backgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,0,0)")
```
